West Shaker Farms This 39+- Acres of land For Sale in the Town of Colonie, NY 12205 was part of the first American Shaker Settlement, and was worked by the West Family. The West Family grew a wide variety of Vegetables Crops.

item.title: U.S. homeownership rate at lowest level since the Johnson Administration: Record low inventory and inflated prices keeps families from buying.
item.description:
U.S. homeownership rate at lowest level since the Johnson Administration: Record low inventory and inflated prices keeps families from buying.

It is common wisdom that prudent investing requires diversification. If you were saving for retirement, you would want to buy a pool of funds to spread out your risk. This is why many people will buy index funds that represent the market.

item.title: Office & Warehouse Complex
item.description:
Office & Warehouse Complex

This Property sits on 10 Acres in North Troy, NY, it offers a great opportunity to create a work, live, play campus, directly adjacent to Catholic Central High School. Main Building/Warehouse now included in sale. This site stretches from 115th St to 119th St and borders the Uncle Sam Bike Path with over 400+-Ft of frontage on 7th Ave.

item.title: When a $20.1 million sale price for an apartment complex isn't what it seems
item.description:
When a $20.1 million sale price for an apartment complex isn't what it seems

The text and emails from three trusted real estate sources arrived quickly, each with basically the same message: There was something wrong with the $20.1 million sale price I reported for an upscale apartment complex in Bethlehem, New York. "Something doesn't add up," one person said. "[Definitely] shouldn't sell for $86K per unit.
